Definition: User supplied unique identifier to represent a specific entity from within a system, database, or application.
Beginning of an assessment period. Usually relates to the beginning of an entity’s tax year but could be aligned to another annual reporting framework.
Conclusion of an assessment period. Usually relates to the end of an entity’s tax year but could be aligned to another annual reporting framework.
Primary geographic area (defined by Territorial Authorities) the farm sits within. Values defined by: Territory_list
Classification of farm based on sector, activity, region, geography, and grazing levels. Values defined by Primary_Farm_Class_list
Whether or not a solid separator is used as part of farm effluent management system.
